title: fix: expand POLLINATIONS_TOKEN env var in router config
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Polly finds the right keys
gist.blurb: Fixed a variable expansion bug in our internal auto-fix workflow. The robots can authenticate again.
gist.summary: Updated the GitHub Actions workflow to correctly expand the authentication token environment variable in the router configuration.
gist.impact: Restores functionality to the automated issue-fixing pipeline.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot (Polly) handing a glowing access key (token) to the monitor robot (automation system). Represents the authentication fix.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot handing a glowing lime green (#ecf874) key card to the cute monitor-head robot. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'ACCESS'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
